name: Bullet Train Subway Journey-Rail Driver at Station
name_original: Bullet Train Subway Journey-Rail Driver at Station
description:
Good morning young driver! Welcome to your first day on the job. Today’s task will be a simple point to point driving test to see how fast your reactions are. Navigate and rush you bullet train through the waypoints, keeping wary of your speed, and make landing on stations by braking at precise timing. Don’t mess up and you will be ready for bigger rides ahead.

GAMEPLAY:

Simulation gets supersonically realistic, as players get the chance to drive an ultra-fast bullet train through the drifts and turns of vast city suburbs. Based on five challenging missions, players will start as a rookie driver with basic driving and parking tasks, with complex locations and objectives awaiting in the later levels.
Drive to ultimate speeds using the onscreen slider for adjustment of speed. There is also an emergency push controller to apply disc brakes, if the speed gets out of control. Keep an eye out for the destinations, as you will be prompted to speed down to arrive on station. Overshoot the station, and you will have a number of frustrated passengers and a termination letter at your disposal!

FEATURES:

- Ultra realistic bullet train simulation controls
- Slider or speed adjustment and disc brake controls
- Lush city suburb environment with highly detailed bridges, flyovers and skyscrapers
- Five levels with increasing difficulty as you progress further
